attributes.action: Driving tests every 3 years for over 70's
attributes.additional_details: I would like to tighten up the regulations for elderly drivers which are not fit for purpose. Our elderly population is increasing and the vast majority are good drivers. However a combination of physical & mental frailty is a disaster behind the wheel and many elderly patients lack insight into their lack of ability. I believe this would reduce accidents on the road and improve the reputation of elderly drivers by only allowing the capable ones of continuing to drive.
